name: Celeriac
description: Celeriac is a large root that develops at soil level and looks like a textured turnip. It is topped with curly leaves. Celeriac root has a flavor similar to celery (they are in the same family) and is delicious in soups, stews, and casseroles. Because it is a root vegetable, it can be stored for months.
sowing_method: Seed indoors, then transplant outside into soil
